website_summaries.verdict: This is a well-built power bank that has versatility in the fact that it can charge two devices at once.
pros: Designed to be slim and lightweight, making it easy to travel light
Possesses impressive ability to charge laptop and additional device simultaneously
cons: Some say the cord is shorter than they would prefer

customer_reviews.title: One charger to rule them all
customer_reviews.text: Having one charger/cable set that can simultaneously charge a laptop and phone, whether or not there is an outlet available, is fantastic; and since it can be used it as a primary charger, the battery is always ready to go. Battery is good for 2+ phone charges, 1 full laptop charge (while in use), or some lesser combination of the two. Loses a star because the charger piece gets worryingly hot and makes funny noises.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a really impressive charger. Much bigger than expected (which may put some people off), but for 29.99, I get a genuine Dell charger and a beast of a power bank that I have used on phones, drones and watching Game of Thrones.
customer_reviews.author: DrWhodini

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK product
customer_reviews.text: This backup does NOT last that long, and forget plugging in your cell phone, made in China also
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose genuine Dell power source works well.
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger / heavier than it looks online but it works great. It has 2 different types of cables to charge a variety of Dell laptops. The top portion can be detached to act as an ac power source for the Dell laptop. The bottom portion has a USB port that can be used to charge your phone or other mobile device. It recharges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Get a few more hours out of your laptop before having to recharge
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I work on my computer outside whenever possible and there isn’t always an outlet around. This is the perfect solution and gives me an extra few hours work time. It won’t charge my laptop fully, but at $30, the extra few hours it does give is great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C. Swanger

customer_reviews.title: Works great just wish the cord was longer and didn’t get as hot
customer_reviews.text: I have found that I unplug the battery pack and use it for other things too. I like that. I just wish the charging cable was a little longer and didn’t get so hot as quickly as it does. Didn’t happen with factory charger but does with this one. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nagol

customer_reviews.title: Works with my Dell Latitude
customer_reviews.text: I run my laptop down to 30% then plug this battery pack in. This battery pack fully charged will give me another 20% life on the laptop battery. Good for back up power supply, but will not fully charge your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for 5 months now. It still works great. My only issue is that the cord from the battery to the wall is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big but it works really well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Amazon for 1/3 the price they had it on the Dell site. Works great, bonus, you can charge your phone too!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Farris

customer_reviews.title: Recalled product and it a still sell?
customer_reviews.text: I have reported to Amazon . This is a recalled from Dell and they still advertise on Amazon. I am thinking to call the News
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well ; but the temperature of the battery increase during charge process
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Veganzones Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: After having for a few months the battery does not last at all. I leave it charging over night and when I use it, it only charge for 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: tanliam

customer_reviews.title: Dell's Dell Hybrid Adapter  + Power Bank is proprietary.
customer_reviews.text: The Dell Hybrid Adapter + Power Bank worked with my Inspiron 15 7000. It gave the extra power needed to finish my 6 hour workload.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: It does get a little warm, but not hotter than oem charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was recalled
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to add some juice to my laptop. However, very often my laptop would tell me that it could not determine the type of charger and it would not charge. I figured the problem was with my laptop. Well, get my new laptop and low and behold the problem persists. I look into it and as it turns out, this product was recalled in 2019. No idea how it's still being sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Not for laptops.
customer_reviews.text: Dies rapidly. Does not meet expectation for it’s worth. You’d expect a dell charger to charge a laptop at least to 70% but it only gets about 5%. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Charges Xps13 45%
customer_reviews.text: From full to empty the bank only charges my Dell xps13 45%. Does anyone else experience this
customer_reviews.author: Robbie M.
